parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: IsError
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to include the traces of abnormal calls.

*   `true`: No
*   `false` (default): Yes

parameters.name: MinDuration
parameters.description: The minimum amount of time consumed by traces. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: OperationName
parameters.description: The name of the traced span.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: Reverse
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to sort the query results in chronological order or reverse chronological order. Default value: `false`.

*   `true`: sorts the query results in reverse chronological order.
*   `false`: sorts the query results in chronological order.

parameters.name: ServiceIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the host where the application resides.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.
